name: Cesare Dress up
description:
A dressup of my oc, Cesare!!!
Drag/Drop clothes
Some might get stuck on others, but you can pull them apart!!

Oc is part of the CS, Sprinkle Kitties created by ikkuyo and Maemi-tan on Deviantart!
